details.sectionContent: This event is all about your technical skills and your applied knowledge

Dive into the heart of automobile!!
The aim is to explore the technical knowledge regarding automobile engineering. Spark your way through the elaborate round which would test your technical  solving and reasoning skills.

â€¢  Participants have to give a aptitude test to test the technical skill.
The time limit will be 1 hour.
Best performing team would head to round 2

Various engine components will be placed at different locations in a bounded space. One team member will be blind folded and the other team member will be guiding him.. The blind folded person has to guess the correct name of component.
Guess as many correct as you can within the time limit of 3 minutes.
Best performing team would proceed to round 3.
Best performing  teams after round 2  will be given a chance to practically perform assembly and disassembly of 4 stroke i.c engine.
Mech Projector room on 5th Feb @ 10:45 am
